translated: In Tibetan: chos drug rdo rje’i tshig rkang zhes bya ba🔽Homage to glorious great bliss of union.🔽Whatever is inexpressible, spontaneously present,

original: 'dus ma byas/_/kha sbyar bde chen longs sku gang 'dul shar/_/sku gsum
analyzed: 'dus ma byas/_/kha sbyar bde chen longs sku gang 'dul shar/_/sku gsum
translated: uncompounded, and united—the great bliss saṃbhogakāya that arises to tame whomever—🔽the powerful Vajradhara, who possesses the three kāyas and seven qualities,

original: bdun ldan rdo rje 'chang dbang gis/_/theg chen skye med rang sgra 'di skad thos//
analyzed: bdun ldan rdo rje 'chang dbang gis/_/theg chen skye med rang sgra 'di skad thos//
translated: heard this sound of the Mahāyāna’s unborn nature.🔽Whoever has been ripened by the four empowerments, has faith and diligence,

original: dbang bzhis smin byas dad dang brtshon 'grus ldan/_/mi rtag skyo shas nyes🔽dmigs sngon 'gro bas/_/lam mchog 'di la gang gis 'bad gyur na/_/zla

translated: and has the preliminaries of impermanence, disenchantment, and the faults of samsara,🔽if they exert themselves in this supreme path,🔽in six months, a year, or in this life, they will become a buddha.

original: drug lo'am tshhe 'dir sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/thabs lam bde drod rang 'bar/_/
analyzed: drug lo'am tshhe 'dir sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/thabs lam bde drod rang 'bar/_/
translated: The path of methods is the naturally blazing bliss-warmth.

original: sgyu lus chags sdang rang grol/_/rmi lam nying 'khrul rang dag_/'od gsal
analyzed: sgyu lus chags sdang rang grol/_/rmi lam nying 'khrul rang dag_/'od gsal
translated: dream is the natural purity of double delusion,🔽luminosity is the natural purity of ignorance,

original: gti mug rang sangs/_/'pho ba ma sgoms sangs rgyas/_/bar do longs spyod🔽rdzogs sku/_/
analyzed: gti mug rang sangs/_/'pho ba ma sgoms sangs rgyas/_/bar do longs spyod rdzogs sku/_/
translated: transference is buddhahood without meditation,🔽and the intermediate state is the enjoyment body.

original: chos drug rdo rje'i tshhig rkang zhes bya ba/
analyzed: chos drug rdo rje'i tshhig rkang zhes bya ba/
translated: The Six Dharmas: Vajra Lines

original: rang lus thabs ldan rtsha gsum 'khor lo bzhi/_/a ham 'bar 'dzag skad
analyzed: rang lus thabs ldan rtsha gsum 'khor lo bzhi/_/a ham 'bar 'dzag skad
translated: One’s body is the method, the three channels, the four cakras,🔽the blazing and dripping of “a haṃ,” and the four joys adorned with the instant.

original: cig dga' bzhis brgyan/_/shes rab kha ga mu kha'i snyoms 'jug gis/_/zag🔽bcas zag med dga' bzhi rim bzhin no/_/bcud bsdus dag byed stong ra'i
analyzed: cig dga' bzhis brgyan/_/shes rab kha ga mu kha'i snyoms 'jug gis/_/zag bcas zag med dga' bzhi rim bzhin no/_/bcud bsdus dag byed stong ra'i
translated: Through the union of the wisdom khagamukhā,🔽the four joys are in order, with and without impurity.🔽The three vital points of gathering the essence, purifying, and the empty enclosure,🔽and the six dharmas of caṇḍālī are in order:

original: gnad gsum dang /_/drod myur gtum mo'i chos drug rim bzhin te/_/ri bong
analyzed: gnad gsum dang /_/drod myur gtum mo'i chos drug rim bzhin te/_/ri bong
translated: the rabbit,🔽the holding, the reversal, and the mixing with the side.

original: dbab bzung zlog 'gram 7rlung dang bsre/_/zag med ye shes chen pos brgyan
analyzed: dbab bzung zlog 'gram 7rlung dang bsre/_/zag med ye shes chen pos brgyan
translated: It is adorned with the great, immaculate exalted wisdom.

original: par bya'o/_/gtum mo zas su za ba/_gos su gyon pa/_stan du 'dings pa/
analyzed: par bya'o/_/gtum mo zas su za ba/_gos su gyon pa/_stan du 'dings pa/
translated: Caṇḍālī is eating food, wearing clothes, spreading a seat,

original: srid pa'i dbang zhu ba/_gegs rang grol dang rlung rtar zhon pa'o/_/
analyzed: srid pa'i dbang zhu ba/_gegs rang grol dang rlung rtar zhon pa'o/_/
translated: taking empowerment of existence, naturally liberating obstacles, and riding the vāyu.

original: sgyu lus bden med dbang po rab 'bring gsum/_/'bral med mos gus
analyzed: sgyu lus bden med dbang po rab 'bring gsum/_/'bral med mos gus
translated: will have constant devotion and🔽will integrate all appearances of their own bodies,

original: rang lus cir snang kun/_/snang stong bden bral lha sku'i lam khyer bya/_/chags
analyzed: rang lus cir snang kun/_/snang stong bden bral lha sku'i lam khyer bya/_/chags
translated: which are empty appearances free of true existence, into the deity’s form.

original: sdang rang grol bcu bzhi'i sa thob 'gyur/_/dbang po rab grogs su bla ma dam pa
analyzed: sdang rang grol bcu bzhi'i sa thob 'gyur/_/dbang po rab grogs su bla ma dam pa
translated: The highest will attain the fourteenth stage,

original: brten pa/_'bring tshhig gzhan gyis bar ma chod par khrid pa/_tha ma mal cig
analyzed: brten pa/_'bring tshhig gzhan gyis bar ma chod par khrid pa/_tha ma mal cig
translated: the middling will be guided without interruption by another’s🔽speech,🔽and the lesser will develop meditative concentration in a single🔽sitting.

original: tu ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa'o/_/gang gis bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas/
analyzed: tu ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa'o/_/gang gis bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas/
translated: Whoever completely abandons all thoughts🔽and is constantly focused on the key point of aspiration in

original: rmi lam 'dun pa'i gnad la 'bral med bya/_/nying 'khrul yang dag sgyu ma lam
analyzed: rmi lam 'dun pa'i gnad la 'bral med bya/_/nying 'khrul yang dag sgyu ma lam
translated: dreams

original: rim gyi/_/yon tan nyin mtshhan dus su rang shar 'byung /_/
analyzed: rim gyi/_/yon tan nyin mtshhan dus su rang shar 'byung /_/
translated: will naturally experience the qualities of the stages of the🔽correct illusion🔽day and night.🔽The practices of recognizing, purifying, increasing, emanating,

original: rmi lam bzung ba/_sbyang ba/_spel ba/_sprul pa/_bsgyur ba/_yul
analyzed: rmi lam bzung ba/_sbyang ba/_spel ba/_sprul pa/_bsgyur ba/_yul
translated: changing,

original: snang ngo /_/'khrul 'byams/_bde 'byams/_stong 'byams rnams/_mos
analyzed: snang ngo /_/'khrul 'byams/_bde 'byams/_stong 'byams rnams/_mos
translated: and objective appearances

original: gus tshhogs sogs gar sel brgyan par bya/_/
analyzed: gus tshhogs sogs gar sel brgyan par bya/_/
translated: are to be applied wherever there is distraction.

original: 'od gsal 'char byed bla ma'i mos gus dang /_/bde chen zag bcas
analyzed: 'od gsal 'char byed bla ma'i mos gus dang /_/bde chen zag bcas
translated: The arising of luminosity is enhanced by devotion to the guru,🔽and by the contaminated and uncontaminated gazes of great bliss,

original: zag med lta stangs kyis/_/bde gsal mi rtog dbyer med rang shar 'byung /_/
analyzed: zag med lta stangs kyis/_/bde gsal mi rtog dbyer med rang shar 'byung /_/
translated: the inseparability of bliss, clarity, and nonthought arises naturally.

original: sbyor dngos rjes gsum dus gnad brgyan par bya/_/'od gsal bzung ba lam🔽khyer bsre ba mthar thug go/_/'od gsal mngon gyur dam pa nyams myong can/
analyzed: sbyor dngos rjes gsum dus gnad brgyan par bya/_/'od gsal bzung ba lam khyer bsre ba mthar thug go/_/'od gsal mngon gyur dam pa nyams myong can/
translated: The three stages of the preliminary, main, and concluding practices should be adorned with the key points of time.🔽The ultimate is the mixing of the luminosity that is apprehended with the path.

original: 'char sgo gegs sel bogs 'don brgyan par bya/_/
analyzed: 'char sgo gegs sel bogs 'don brgyan par bya/_/
translated: Those who have experience of the sublime actual luminosity should adorn the arising of the gateways with the removal of obstacles and enhancement.🔽The best are free from the object of transference and the one who transfers.🔽The middling and the average should give up attachment and aversion,

original: 'pho bya 'pho byed bral ba yang rab ste/_/'bring dang tha mas chags sdang spang byas nas/_/dga' zhing mos gus dmigs pa rtshe gcig gis/_/gyen du
analyzed: 'pho bya 'pho byed bral ba yang rab ste/_/'bring dang tha mas chags sdang spang byas nas/_/dga' zhing mos gus dmigs pa rtshe gcig gis/_/gyen du
translated: and with joy, devotion, and one-pointed focus,🔽they should be adorned with aspirations.

original: 'phang zhing smon lam brgyan par bya/_/chos sku de bzhin nyid kyi 'pho ba/_zung
analyzed: 'phang zhing smon lam brgyan par bya/_/chos sku de bzhin nyid kyi 'pho ba/_zung
translated: The transference of the dharmakāya is the transference of suchness.🔽The transference of the yidam is the transference of unity.🔽The transference of the guru is the transference of blessings.

original: 'jug yi dam gyi 'pho ba/_byin rlabs bla ma'i 'pho ba/_'chug med mkha'
analyzed: 'jug yi dam gyi 'pho ba/_byin rlabs bla ma'i 'pho ba/_'chug med mkha'
translated: The infallible transference is the transference to the celestial realm.

original: spyod kyi 'pho ba'o/_/dus gnad lus gnad rdzas dang ngag gnad la/_/sbyangs
analyzed: spyod kyi 'pho ba'o/_/dus gnad lus gnad rdzas dang ngag gnad la/_/sbyangs
translated: The key points of time, the key points of the body, substances, and the key points of speech should be trained in.

original: shing brtan pas 'pho ba mchog yin no/_/
analyzed: shing brtan pas 'pho ba mchog yin no/_/
translated: The best transference is to a stable place.🔽The appearances of the bardo and so forth are the dharmakaya luminosity,

original: bar do snang sogs 'od gsal chos sku dang /_/gang 'dul sprul skus
analyzed: bar do snang sogs 'od gsal chos sku dang /_/gang 'dul sprul skus
translated: and the nirmanakaya that tames whomever is🔽the connection.

original: mtshhams sbyor skyo shas gnad/_/chags sdang phrag dog 'od gsal lha skus sbyang /
analyzed: mtshhams sbyor skyo shas gnad/_/chags sdang phrag dog 'od gsal lha skus sbyang /
translated: The key point of weariness is to purify attachment, aversion, and jealousy with the luminosity of the deity’s body.🔽The two obscurations are naturally purified, and the three kayas are actualized.

original: sgrib gnyis rang dag sku gsum mngon du 'gyur/_/bar do dang po'i 'od gsal
analyzed: sgrib gnyis rang dag sku gsum mngon du 'gyur/_/bar do dang po'i 'od gsal
translated: The luminosity of the first bardo arises by itself;🔽in the middle, the victor’s sambhogakaya arises by itself;

original: rang shar/_'bring rgyal ba longs sku rang shar/_tha ma sprul sku 'gag med rang
analyzed: rang shar/_'bring rgyal ba longs sku rang shar/_tha ma sprul sku 'gag med rang
translated: and in the end, the nirmanakaya arises by itself without🔽obstruction.🔽The general key point is the unerring integration of the path.

original: shar/_spyi gnad 'chug med lam 'khyer ro/_/gzugs sgra chu snang byed la
analyzed: shar/_spyi gnad 'chug med lam 'khyer ro/_/gzugs sgra chu snang byed la
translated: The dissolution process of form, sound, water, and so forth

original: sogs pa yi/_/thim 'gros rang bzhin brgyad cu shes par bya'o//_//🔽log ltas rgyud dkrugs rtshod ldan snyigs ma'i dus/_/yang dag chos ni nyin
analyzed: sogs pa yi/_/thim 'gros rang bzhin brgyad cu shes par bya'o//_// log ltas rgyud dkrugs rtshod ldan snyigs ma'i dus/_/yang dag chos ni nyin
translated: should be understood as the eighty natural concepts.🔽In this degenerate age, when the mind is disturbed by wrong views,🔽the true dharma is like a star in the daytime or a turtle’s🔽hair.

original: skar ru sbal spu/_/chos log tshhong dus 'o ma'i chos spyod tshhe/_/nyams myong lung
analyzed: skar ru sbal spu/_/chos log tshhong dus 'o ma'i chos spyod tshhe/_/nyams myong lung
translated: When the dharma is corrupted, the practice of dharma is like milk.

original: dang them yig brgyan pa gces/_/lim gyi mchog gyur 'di ni nyams len rnams/
analyzed: dang them yig brgyan pa gces/_/lim gyi mchog gyur 'di ni nyams len rnams/
translated: For those who practice it,🔽Whether at the time of death, or in the bardo,

original: gzhan gyi dus min 'di'am bar ma dor/_/bde stong dbyer med rang shar nas//
analyzed: gzhan gyi dus min 'di'am bar ma dor/_/bde stong dbyer med rang shar nas//
translated: The indivisible bliss and emptiness will arise by themselves,🔽And they will go to the completely pure celestial realm.

original: rnam par dag pa'i mkha' spyod nyid du 'gro/_/'di nyid mi rabs bdun du chig
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i mkha' spyod nyid du 'gro/_/'di nyid mi rabs bdun du chig
translated: This should be passed on to only one person in each generation,🔽And sealed with the seal of secrecy.

original: brgyud las/_/mi spel rdo rje'i rgya yis gdab par bya/_/chos drug rdo rje'i tshhig
analyzed: brgyud las/_/mi spel rdo rje'i rgya yis gdab par bya/_/chos drug rdo rje'i tshhig
translated: The Six Dharmas: The Vajra Lines

original: rkang zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: rkang zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//
translated: is complete.

original: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i zhal nas lotsh+tshha ba glan dar ma blo gros kyis
analyzed: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i zhal nas lotsh+tshha ba glan dar ma blo gros kyis
translated: The dakini of Timeless Awareness said this, and Lotstshawa Gyalwa Darma Lodro

original: chos drug rdo rje'i tshhig rkang zhes bya ba/
analyzed: chos drug rdo rje'i tshhig rkang zhes bya ba/
translated: translated it as The Six Dharmas: The Vajra Lines.

original: bsgyur ba'o/_/ bdag khyung po rnal 'byor pas gser srang lnga brgya phul nas zhus te nyams
analyzed: bsgyur ba'o/_/ bdag khyung po rnal 'byor pas gser srang lnga brgya phul nas zhus te nyams
translated: I, Khyungpo Naljor, offered five hundred ounces of gold and requested it,

original: su myong bar byas pa'o/_/
analyzed: su myong bar byas pa'o/_/
translated: and then put it into practice.

original: phyis tho ling du lotsh+tshha ba rin chen bzang pos gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: phyis tho ling du lotsh+tshha ba rin chen bzang pos gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: Later, in Tholing, Lotstshawa Rinchen Zangpo finalized it.
